title: farming Farmers warn of 'welfare crisis' as new, stricter stocking rates confirmed - Irish Examiner
summary: Dairy farmers in Ireland face challenges meeting new stricter nitrates limits, potentially leading to culling of heavily pregnant cows. Department officials are interpreting data to adjust stocking rates and protect water quality, with farmers given a short timeframe to comply.
company: Irish Creamery and Milk Suppliers Association
official_company_name: Irish Creamery and Milk Suppliers Association
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 111998 - All Other Miscellaneous Crop Farming; 112120 - Dairy Cattle and Milk Production; 112340 - Poultry Hatcheries; 112990 - All Other Animal Production
